title: Similar to Proxima Nova but different
author: live003

comments.content: Might be [Montserrat](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062435/http:/fontpro.com/montserrat-font-16367), free font by Julieta Ulanovsky but only for "STARTS MIDNIGHT/CYBER MONDAY". Bottom digits are definitely something else.
Montserrat, thats it! Thanks so much for your help!
